title: Seafood casserole with saffron and vegetables
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '150 g (5½ oz) carrots, thickly sliced', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '150 g (5½ oz) onions, sliced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '350 g (12 oz) new potatoes, halved if large', '300 ml (10 fl oz) vegetable or fish stock', '10-12 strands saffron', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) cod, haddock or salmon', '150 g (5½ oz) green beans, halved', '125 ml (4 fl oz) dry white wine', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 tablespoon skimmed milk', '125 g (4½ oz) cooked, peeled prawns, defrosted if frozen', 'Salt and black pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh herbs, such as chives, parsley, tarragon or thyme']
